title: RQShineLabel
description: A UILabel subclass that lets you animate text similar to Secret app.

title: FLAnimatedImage
description: FLAnimatedImage is a performant animated GIF engine for iOS: 1. Plays multiple GIFs simultaneously with a playback speed comparable to desktop browsers 2. Honors variable frame delays 3. Behaves gracefully under memory pressure 4. Eliminates delays or blocking during the first playback loop 5. Interprets the frame delays of fast GIFs the same way modern browsers do
author: Flipboard

title: YLGIFImage
description: Asynchronized GIF image class and Image viewer supporting play/stop GIF images. It just use very less memory. Following GIF usually will cost almost 600MB memory if it is fully decoded (800x600x389x4 Bytes), but using YLGIFImage, it just use about 30MB memory.
author: liyong03

title: YLGIFImage
description: Asynchronized GIF image class and Image viewer supporting play/stop GIF images. It just use very less memory. Following GIF usually will cost almost 600MB memory if it is fully decoded (800x600x389x4 Bytes), but using YLGIFImage, it just use about 30MB memory.
author: liyong03
